Code: MAYDLSTUCEL Brand: Yoga Design Lab Product Weight: 2.2kg Mat Thickness: 3.5mm Sustainability: BSCI, REACH SVHC, OEKO-TEX Eco Passport, GRS Made In: China Made From: Natural Tree Rubber + Recycled PET Microfiber + Water Based Inks Suitable For: All styles of yoga, especially hot yoga Care Instructions: Hand wash to extend the life of your mat. The mats may also be machine washed, but only on a gentle cycle using a machine without a center agitator. Hang to dry away from direct sunlight. Roll with patterned side out. 178 x 61cm x 3.5mm
